title: Godfist Lee Sin Skin Available?
body: It is posted in his champion skin list in the shop but is not available in the store.

replies.body: It's been announced per the [patch notes](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-77-notes), but new skins don't always release on launch.  It's aimed to release sometime during the patch.  Bookmark the [Sales](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales) page for any news on his new godlike skin!
